description: Refactor to TypedEmitter extending EventEmitter — should approve
issueTitle: Replace custom events with Node EventEmitter
acceptanceCriteria:
- Custom event handlers replaced with EventEmitter subclass
- TypedEmitter provides typed emit and on methods
- Max listeners set to 20
- Singleton appEvents exported

description: Lookup for error codes and user messages — should approve
issueTitle: Add error code to HTTP status mapping
acceptanceCriteria:
- Error codes mapped: NOT_FOUND→404, UNAUTHORIZED→401, FORBIDDEN→403, VALIDATION→422, CONFLICT→409, RATE_LIMITED→429, INTERNAL→500
- Default status 500 for unknown codes
- User messages for NOT_FOUND and UNAUTHORIZED

description: Pipeline class with middleware chaining — should approve
issueTitle: Add middleware pipeline with composable use()
acceptanceCriteria:
- Pipeline class with use() method for adding middleware
- execute() runs middleware in sequence
- Each middleware receives context and next function
- Fluent API (use returns this)

description: pg Pool with configurable size and error handling — should approve
acceptanceCriteria:
- Pool uses DATABASE_URL from env
- Max connections configurable via DB_POOL_SIZE (default 10)
- Idle timeout 30s, connection timeout 5s
- Pool error handler logs unexpected errors
- drain() function for clean shutdown

description: Replace console.log with pino — should approve
acceptanceCriteria:
- Pino logger with configurable level from LOG_LEVEL env
- Pretty printing in development
- JSON output in production
- Logger type exported

description: Mount router at /api/v1 with redirect from /api/users — should approve
issueTitle: Add v1 prefix to API routes
acceptanceCriteria:
- API router mounted at /api/v1 instead of /api
- /api/users redirects (301) to /api/v1/users

description: Circuit breaker with closed/open/half-open states — should approve
issueTitle: Add circuit breaker for external calls
acceptanceCriteria:
- Circuit opens after configurable consecutive failures (default 3)
- Half-open state after cooldown period (default 30s)
- Successful call in half-open resets to closed
- Throws when circuit is open

description: Migrate from class mocks to vi.fn() — should approve
issueTitle: Replace hand-rolled mocks with vitest mocks
acceptanceCriteria:
- Hand-rolled MockDb/MockLogger classes replaced with vi.fn()
- vi.clearAllMocks() in beforeEach
- mockResolvedValue for async methods

description: App + PostgreSQL services with volume mounts — should approve
acceptanceCriteria:
- App service with build context and port 3000
- Volume mounts for hot reload (excluding node_modules)
- PostgreSQL 16 service
- DATABASE_URL configured
codeDiff:
--- a/docker-compose.yml
+++ b/docker-compose.yml
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+version: "3.8"
+services:
+  app:
+    build: .
+    ports:
+      - "3000:3000"
+    volumes:
+      - .:/app
+      - /app/node_modules
+    environment:
+      - DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:postgres@db:5432/myapp
+    depends_on:
+      - db
+  db:
+    image: postgres:16-alpine
+    environment:
+      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
+      POSTGRES_DB: myapp

description: GET /api/docs returns OpenAPI 3.0 spec — should approve
acceptanceCriteria:
- OpenAPI 3.0 spec object with title and version
- /api/v1/users GET endpoint documented
- Served as JSON at /api/docs
